001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.service;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
005import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.R;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.dao.ApodDao;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.entity.Apod;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
011import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
012import java.time.LocalDate;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
015import javax.annotation.Nullable;
016import javax.inject.Inject;
017import javax.inject.Singleton;
018
019@Singleton
020public class ApodRepository {
021
022  private static final String TAG = ApodRepository.class.getSimpleName();
023
024
025  private final ApodProxyService proxyService;
026  private final ApodDao apodDao;
027  private final LocalDate firstApodDate;
028  private final String apiKey;
029
030  private final io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler scheduler = Schedulers.from(
031      Executors.newFixedThreadPool(4));
032
033  @Inject
034  public ApodRepository(
035      @ApplicationContext Context context,
036      ApodProxyService proxyService,
037      ApodDao apodDao) {
038    this.proxyService = proxyService;
039    this.apodDao = apodDao;
040    this.firstApodDate = LocalDate.parse(context.getString(R.string.first_apod_date));
041    this.apiKey = context.getString(R.string.api_key);
042
043  }
044
045  public Completable fetch(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) {
046    LocalDate validatedStartDate = startDate.isBefore(firstApodDate) ? firstApodDate : startDate;
047    validateDates(validatedStartDate, endDate);
048
049    return (endDate.isBefore(LocalDate.now())
050        ? proxyService.getDateRange(validatedStartDate, endDate, apiKey)
051        : proxyService.getOpenDateRange(validatedStartDate, apiKey))
052        .flatMapCompletable(apodDao::insert)
053        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
054  }
055
056  public Single<Long> fetchRandomApod() {
057    return proxyService.getRandomApod(apiKey)
058        .flatMap(apodDao::insert)
059        .map(Math::abs)
060        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
061  }
062
063  public Completable fetchApodsForDateAcrossYears(LocalDate birthDate) {
064    LocalDate startDate = birthDate.withYear(firstApodDate.getYear());
065    LocalDate endDate = birthDate.withYear(LocalDate.now().getYear());
066
067    return proxyService.getSpecificDateAcrossYears(startDate, endDate, apiKey)
068        .flatMapCompletable(apodDao::insert)
069        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
070  }
071
072  public LiveData<Apod> get(long id) {
073    return apodDao.select(id);
074  }
075
076  public LiveData<List<Apod>> getFavorites() {
077    return apodDao.getFavorites();
078  }
079
080  public LiveData<List<Apod>> get(LocalDate startDate, @Nullable LocalDate endDate) {
081    if (endDate == null) {
082      return apodDao.selectOpenRange(startDate);
083    }
084    return apodDao.selectRange(startDate, endDate);
085  }
086
087  private void validateDates(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) {
088    if (startDate.isAfter(endDate)) {
089      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Start date cannot be after end date.");
090    }
091  }
092}
